alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jackson and northeastern Washington Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marianna, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, Marianna, Malone, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Alford, Campbellton, Richter Crossroads, Blue Spring, Union City, Star, Jacobs, Bahoma, Ellaville, Marianna Municipal A/P, Jacob City, Chipley Municipal Airport and Orange Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
